name: BABOON

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The baboon has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) Piercing damage.

raw_text:
AC 12 	Initiative +2 (12)
HP 3 (1d6)
Speed 30 ft., Climb 30 ft.
MOD 	SAVE
STR 	8 	−1 	−1
DEX 	14 	+2 	+2
CON 	11 	+0 	+0
MOD 	SAVE
INT 	4 	−3 	−3
WIS 	12 	+1 	+1
CHA 	6 	−2 	−2
Senses Passive Perception 11
Languages None
CR 0 (XP 10; PB +2)
Traits
Pack Tactics. The baboon has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if
at least one of the baboon’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally
doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
Actions
Bite. Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach 5 ft.
Hit: 1 (1d4 − 1) Piercing damage.
Small Beast, Unaligned
